synopsis.text: Follows the journey of Natsuna Keyaki, a Tokyo college student who sets out to Kumamoto in search of her missing friend after the devastating 2016 earthquakes. Armed with only a sketch of the landscape and a vague idea of her friend's whereabouts, Natsuna encounters a vibrant cast of locals, including a lively middle school girl named Izumi. As she navigates the disaster-stricken prefecture, Natsuna finds support and kindness from the locals, who help her uncover the truth about her friend's fate while igniting a newfound passion within her. This heartwarming coming-of-age tale is a testament to the power of community and the unexpected paths that lead us to self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
